description: Detects listing or file reading of ".dockerenv" which can be a sing of potential container discovery
author: Seth Hanford
false_positives: Legitimate system administrator usage of these commands
Some container tools or deployments may use these techniques natively to determine how they proceed with execution, and will need to be filtered
name: Docker Container Discovery Via Dockerenv Listing
query: (process.executable:(/.*\/[Cc][Aa][Tt]/ OR /.*\/[Dd][Ii][Rr]/ OR /.*\/[Ff][Ii][Nn][Dd]/ OR /.*\/[Ll][Ss]/ OR /.*\/[Ss][Tt][Aa][Tt]/ OR /.*\/[Tt][Ee][Ss][Tt]/ OR *grep) AND process.command_line:/.*\.[Dd][Oo][Cc][Kk][Ee][Rr][Ee][Nn][Vv]/)
